item.description: This Meet Up Group is held on the third Saturday every month from 1-3pm and it's FREE! We have a large, outdoor, fenced-in play yard and a large, indoor play room as well. Your dog may run around, off leash, in a safe environment with no worries! All breeds are welcome but your dog must be 30lbs or under to participate in our small group play.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
